modName: Vinis Legit Food and Rest - Legendary add-on
summary: An add-on to Vinis Legit Food and Rest. Adds support to Vinifera7's mod for Hearthfire and Dragonborn DLC food items. Compatible with USLEEP.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2][size=2]
[/size]Permission granted to publish updates, modifications, derived works, and convert this mod to other games, editions and languages.
I do not run Skyrim Special Edition and don't intend to port this. Anyone allowed to do it.

[u]Description[/u]

This is an add-on for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7511/?]Vini's Legit Food and Rest[/url], my favorite "needs" mod for Skyrim.

It makes the Dragonborn and Hearthfire DLC food items comply with Vini's Legit system. I also threw in the odd [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]USLEEP [/url]changes for good measure.

[u][b]Installation
[/b][/u]
1. Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7511/?]Vini's Legit Food and Rest[/url].
2. Put my add-on .esp in you Skyrim/data directory (or use any sensible mod manager to do that for you).
3. Activate these .esp in your load order. Of course my add-on must be placed [i]after [/i]Vini's Legit Food and Rest.

[u][b]Credits[/b][/u]

Made with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859]TES5edit[/url].
All credit goes to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3531126]Vinifera7[/url], the original mod author.
[/size]
author: auie4545
